job.title: Software Engineer (Entry level)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong><strong>Responsibilities:<br></strong><ul><li>Performs basic software activities related to the development of a software product or solution.</li><li>Determines and examines software alternatives.</li><li>Recommends and implements basic software solutions.</li><li>Works on software development projects, with guidance. </li><li>Taking customer reported incidents and calling/emailing customers to troubleshoot and resolve printing software related issues.</li><li>This includes recreating problems on local systems, researching documentation,</li></ul> <strong>Qualifications:<br><br></strong>Has a basic professional theoretical and conceptual knowledge in a specific field of software development, typically acquired via a bachelor's degree or professional experience.
